name: 如意 🌤✨
text:
[@roytang](https://twitter.com/roytang/) Same!! I wanted to wait with my purchase untile the release of either Harvest Moon remake or new Animal Crossing.. It's a big purchase for me too but NGL I'm tempted haha. Σ(〃▽〃٥)



What's in your backlog? Are you playing anything right now? ( ღ’ᴗ’ღ )
